title: House Sales in Grinnell, Iowa
description:
Description
Data on houses sold between 2005 and 2015 in Grinnell, Iowa
reference: A local Grinnell realtor, Matt Karjalahti, put these data together to see what patterns might be found, perhaps with an improvement in how one sells houses or buys them.  He asked Grinnell College economists, Lee Logan and Eric Ohrn, to help with the analysis and we obtained the data from them.
usage: A data frame with 929 observations on the following 15 variables.

parameters.DaySold: Day of the month the house was sold (1 to 31)
parameters.OrigPrice: List price of the house when originally put on the market (dollars)
parameters.SquareFeet: The square footage of the home's living space
parameters.Date: Coded value for date of sale (Jan 1, 2005=16436)
parameters.YearSold: The year the house was sold, for this case
parameters.MonthSold: The month the house was sold (1=Jan, 2=Feb, to 12=Dec)
parameters.ListPrice: List price at the time of sale (dollars)
parameters.YearBuilt: Year the house was built; many pre-1900 homes are listed as 1900
